alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 26 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Prowers and eastern Baca Counties through 300 PM MST... At 229 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Vilas, or 8 miles southeast of Springfield, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. Strong winds are already occuring in the area, but these thunderstorms could enhance winds further, and wind gusts up to 70 mph may be possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsh, Vilas, Campo, Two Buttes and Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
